title: Niko Sirmpilatze
text:
Thanks for stopping by my little corner of the internet!
Iâ€™m a medical doctor turned neuroscientist and software engineer. I care about promoting open, collaborative, and reproducible science. When not at the computer, you will find me dancing to swing music and failing to play woodwind instruments.
